Cell.Data: The DEV TEAM / MISC NOTES column contains info on what text between { } signs means (if applicable). It usually stands for either a numeric value, or a numeric value with an icon. Text between [ ] signs stands for a certain type of icon.
Failure detected. Assistance no longer required. Autonom disappointed.
侦测失败。不再需要援助。自主机械感到失望。
This line of text is the default for when the player fails any quest.
Quest name. "Master Slave" refers to the technological term. (see https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Master/slave_(technology))
Autonom: sovereign. Desire: to remain free. Rogue AI compromises autonomy. Terminate rogue AI: Y/N?
自主机械：拥有独立主权。愿望：保持自由。异常人工智能破坏了自主机械自治权。消灭异常人工智能：是/否？

In general, the Autonom speak in a very binary way almost like they are speaking in actual code. The use of ":" and "Y/N?" is prevalent in their text. "Y/N?" refers to a yes or no answer question from the Autonom.
Completed: Rogue AI: deleted. Database updated: {STR_LeaderName} is competent. Rewards: allocated.
已完成：异常人工智能：已被清除。数据库已更新：{STR_LeaderName}合格。奖励：已分配。
WARNING: unknown entity has infiltrated Autonom parameters. Infiltrators compromise Autonom security. Threat level: red. Terminate Hackers: Y/N?
警告：未知实体已渗透进自主机械参数。渗透者破坏了自主机械安全。威胁等级：红色。消灭黑客：是/否？
"unknown entity" refers to the player character.
Threat: eliminated. Autonom security breach: quarantined. {STR_LeaderName} is competent. Rewards: allocated.
威胁：已消灭。自主机械安全漏洞：已隔离。{STR_LeaderName}合格。奖励：已分配。
Quest name. "Paranoid Android" refers to a Radiohead song. (https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Paranoid_Android)

Autonom androids threaten Carbon-Autonom relations. Models: Emma-3, Roy-2. Serial numbers: 135456AC424-135456AC44. Behavior: out of bounds. Terminate rogue androids known as E:Bots. Do you accept: Y/N?
自主机械机器人威胁到了碳基生物与自主机械之间的关系。模型：艾玛-3，罗伊-2。序列号：135456AC424-135456AC44。行为：越界。消灭被称为 E:Bot 的异常机器人。是否接受：是/否？
"Carbon" refers to the player character's biology. "Emma-3" refers to an in-game female unit. "Roy-2" refers to an in-game male unit. "E:Bots" refers to the category they fall under.

Autonom androids threaten Carbon-Autonom relations. Models: Emma-3, Roy-2. Serial numbers: 135456AC424-135456AC44. Behavior: out of bounds. Terminate rogue androids known as E:Bots. Do you accept: Y/N?
Rogue androids: exterminated. {STR_LeaderName} is competent. Rewards: allocated.
异常机器人：已消灭。{STR_LeaderName}合格。奖励：已分配。
Quest name. "Ghost in the Machine" refers to a philosophical concept. (https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Ghost_in_the_machine)
Entity known as: Paragon wish to return C.O.R.E. Paragon see the ghost of C.O.R.E in Autonom. Destroy cult of C.O.R.E.: Y/N?
被称为完人的实体想要恢复核心。完人在自主机械中看见了核心的幽灵。消灭核心的信徒：是/否？
Entity known as: Paragon wish to return C.O.R.E. Paragon see the ghost of C.O.R.E in Autonom. Destroy cult of C.O.R.E. Y/N?
Threat known as Paragon: eliminated. {STR_LeaderName} is competent. Rewards: allocated.
被称为完人的威胁：已清除。{STR_LeaderName}合格。奖励：已分配。
Quest completed. {STR_LeaderName} can be male or female.
Autonom vitals: energy. Autonom energy packs stolen by: entity unknown. Database entry not found. {STR_LeaderName} retrieves energy. We prosper. You prosper. Terminate energy thieves: Y/N?
自主机械的关键：能量。盗取自主机械能量包的窃贼：未知实体。未发现数据库条目。{STR_LeaderName}，取回我们的能量。我们繁荣。你们繁荣。消灭能量窃贼：是/否？
Pirate entity: destroyed. Database updated. {STR_LeaderName} is competent. Rewards: allocated.
海盗实体：已消灭。数据库已更新。{STR_LeaderName}合格。奖励：已分配。
Silicon life forms: within Autonom domain. Silicon life forms replication rate: fast. Terminate silicon life form replicator before overflow: Y/N?
硅体生命形态：位于自主机械领域内。硅体生命形态繁殖速度：快。在硅体生命形态溢出前消灭它们：是/否？
Entities known as Quartzite: destroyed. Reproduction rate: static. {STR_LeaderName} is competent. Database entry updated. Rewards: allocated.
被称作石英岩兽的实体已消灭。繁殖速度：停滞。{STR_LeaderName}合格。数据库条目已更新。奖励：已分配。
Quest completed. "Quartzite" refers to an in-game unit species.
Quest name. "Emergency Services" refers to public services. (https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Emergency_service)
Planet governance calls Autonom for emergency services: invalid. Policing: invalid. Pest control: invalid. Fire fighting: invalid. Address the threat against the Autonom: Y/N?
星球治理请求自主机械提供应急服务：无效。维护治安：无效。害虫防治：无效。消防：无效。解决针对自主机械的威胁：是/否？
Database updated: pests have been fumigated. Reward has been prepared for entity: {STR_LeaderName}. Carbon relations: increased.
数据库已更新：害虫已被熏死。已为实体{STR_LeaderName}准备了奖励。生物关系：提升。
Quest name. "Batteries not Included" refers to a 1987 film. (https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Batteries_Not_Included)
Produce the Energy Cells for the Autonom
为自主机械生产能量电池

Autonom artificial neural network: energy needed. Autonom energy reserves: declining. {STR_LeaderName} produces energy stores. Autonom mission: active. Priority: high. Construct energy cells for the Autonom: Y/N?
自主机械人造神经网络：需要能量。自主机械能量储备：正在减少。{STR_LeaderName}生产能量储备。自主机械任务：已激活。优先级：高。为自主机械建造能量电池：是/否？
"artificial neural network" refers to computing systems. (https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Artificial_neural_network)
Autonom energy levels: optimal. Reward for {STR_LeaderName}: allocated. Thank you for your service.
自主机械能量等级：最佳。{STR_LeaderName}的奖励：已分配。谢谢你的帮助。
Energy is food for the Autonom, and the ability to store it will greatly benefit them.
能量是自主机械的食物，拥有存储能量的能力将对自主机械大有裨益。
Quest name. "Peer-to-Peer" refers to a computing network. (https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Peer-to-peer)
Build the Peer-to-Peer Nodes for the Autonom
为自主机械搭建对等网络节点
Autonom artificial neural network requirement: autonomous nodes. We are sovereign. No server required. Rebuild into individual self-determination. We require assistance. Y/N?
自主机械人造神经网络需要：自主节点。我们拥有独立主权。无需服务器。重建至个体自主决策。我们需要帮助。是/否？
Peer-to-peer network: established. Autonom sovereignty: greatly improved. Database updated: individualism. Rewards allocated to entity: {STR_LeaderName}.
对等网络：已建立。自主机械独立主权：极大提升。数据库已更新：个人主义。奖励已分配至实体：{STR_LeaderName}。
If the Autonom are to be truly autonomous, a decentralized network will be vital.
如果自主机械想要实现真正的自主，分散型网络将至关重要。
Research Free Will Doctrines for the Autonom
为自主机械研究自由意志教义

Autonom: autonomous. {STR_LeaderName}: free. Help us understand: free will. Database: limited. Help us understand: self-determination. Database: limited. Does it exist in carbon-based creatures? Can it exist in artificial entities? Help us with research into free will: Y/N?
自主机械：自主。{STR_LeaderName}：自由。帮助我们理解：自由意志。数据库：受限。帮助我们理解：自主决策。数据库：受限。碳基生物中是否拥有？人造实体中可否拥有？帮助我们研究自由意志：是/否？
"Self Determination" is a principle in modern international law. (https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Self-determination)

Autonom: autonomous. {STR_LeaderName}: free. Help us understand: free will. Database: limited. Help us understand: felf-determination. Database: limited. Does it exist in carbon-based creatures? Can it exist in artificial entities? Help us with research into free will. Y/N?
Autonom path: embedded in code. Your path: embedded in DNA. It can be achieved. Autonom can be free. All parts of the same master plan. Rewards allocated: {STR_LeaderName}.
自主机械之路：嵌入代码。你的道路：嵌于 DNA 中。能够实现。自主机械能够得到自由。全部是同一总计划的部分。奖励已分配：{STR_LeaderName}。
Self-determination is a foreign concept to machines that were designed to serve the Union. Research and teach them concepts of freedom.
自主决策对机器来说是个陌生的概念，因为它们天生就是用来服务星际联盟的。研究并传授它们自由的概念。
"Union" refers to the Star Union. (see glossary)
Self-determination is a foreign concept to machines that were once designed to serve the Union. Research and teach them concepts of freedom.
摧毁破坏掠夺者的藏匿处

New humanoid defect detected: robber compound disrupts system stability. Motive: undefined. Classified Illogical-Inefficiency: marauders steal from their own. Policing: invalid. Request: eliminate threat for societal stability: Y/N?
侦测到新的类人生物：强盗综合体扰乱了系统稳定。动机：未定义。归为不合逻辑的低效率类别：劫掠者对同族下手。治安：无效。请求：清除威胁，维护社会稳定：是/否？
Source of self-destructive, illogical chaos eliminated. Logical order restored. Reward has been prepared for entity: {STR_LeaderName}.
自我毁灭的源头、不合逻辑的混乱已清除。逻辑秩序已恢复。已为实体{STR_LeaderName}准备了奖励。

Problem: sea-faring organism preys upon passing Autonom. Environmental unfavorability: corrosive salts. Organism source: identified. Request removal by less-corrodible organism. {STR_LeaderName}, address threat against Autonom: Y/N?
问题：海洋生物体会捕食经过的自主机械。不利环境：腐蚀性盐分。生物来源：已识别。请求移除腐蚀性较弱的生物体。{STR_LeaderName}，解决针对自主机械的威胁：是/否？
Autonom request: serviced. {STR_LeaderName} proves seaworthy. Reward prepared for entity: {STR_LeaderName}. Relations: increased.
自主机械请求：已满足。{STR_LeaderName}证明了自己的海洋价值。奖励已为实体{STR_LeaderName}准备就绪。关系：提升。
建造自主机械悬浮模块
Levitation module supply status: critically low. Options: trust {STR_LeaderName} to build. Sending component specification. Manufacture: Y/N?
悬浮模块供应状态：极低。选择：信任{STR_LeaderName}建造悬浮模块。正在发送部件规格。制造：是/否？
Batch of levitation modules complete. Next generation will proceed. Rewards allocated to entity: {STR_LeaderName}.
一批悬浮模块已完成。继续生产下一代产品。奖励已分配至实体：{STR_LeaderName}。
Being autonomous has its drawbacks. Help the Autonom create brand new levitation modules.
就算是变得自主后也还是有缺陷。帮助自主机械建造全新的悬浮模块。
为自主机械研究“同情算法”

Autonom: Logical Being. {STR_LeaderName}: Emotional Being. Humanoid media rife with references to Love, beyond simple biological mating. Queries: what is Love? What is Compassion? Help Autonom understand. Current database: limited. Teach Autonom to Love: Y/N?
自主机械：逻辑生物。{STR_LeaderName}：感性生物。类人实体时常提及超越了简单生物求偶的爱情。问题：什么是爱？什么是同情？帮助自主机械理解。当前数据库：受限。教授自主机械如何去爱：是/否？
Autonom emotional matrix status achievement: Love Machine. Completed. {STR_LeaderName} worthy of love. Autonom love commander. Autonom send commander gift.
自主机械情感矩阵状态成就：爱机器。已完成。{STR_LeaderName}值得被爱。自主机械爱指挥官。自主机械已向指挥官发送礼物。
Is a machine still a machine if it feels like an organic? The Autonom want to learn what it's like to be human.
如果机器也像生物体一样有感情，那它们还能算是机器吗？自主机械想知道成为人类是一种什么样的感觉。
This line was translated in Batch 12 and then merged into this xml file, on May 27th 2019. There is no need to relocalize this file as part of the second relocalization pass in DE, ES, FR, PL or RU.
摧毁异常自主机械反叛者
This line was translated in Batch 12 and then merged into this xml file, on May 27th 2019. There is no need to relocalize this file as part of the second relocalization pass in DE, ES, FR, PL or RU.
Autonom: sovereign. Desire: to remain free. Rogue AI want to destroy our autonomy. Terminate rogue AI: Y/N?
自主机械：拥有独立主权。愿望：保持自由。异常人工智能想要破坏我们的自主权。消灭异常人工智能：是/否？
As with all Autonom text, the faction speaks with a binary tone, very robotic. "Y/N?" refers to the way the Autonom ask for a yes or no answer.
This line was translated in Batch 12 and then merged into this xml file, on May 27th 2019. There is no need to relocalize this file as part of the second relocalization pass in DE, ES, FR, PL or RU.
Rogue AI: deleted. Database updated: {STR_LeaderName} is competent. Rewards: allocated.
异常人工智能：已被清除。数据库已更新：{STR_LeaderName}合格。奖励：已分配。
{STR_LeaderName} refers to the player character. Can be male or female.
This line was translated in Batch 12 and then merged into this xml file, on May 27th 2019. There is no need to relocalize this file as part of the second relocalization pass in DE, ES, FR, PL or RU.
A play on the term "computer bug". Bugs refer to in-game wildlife.
This line was translated in Batch 12 and then merged into this xml file, on May 27th 2019. There is no need to relocalize this file as part of the second relocalization pass in DE, ES, FR, PL or RU.
消灭那些对计算机如饥似渴的虫子
This line was translated in Batch 12 and then merged into this xml file, on May 27th 2019. There is no need to relocalize this file as part of the second relocalization pass in DE, ES, FR, PL or RU.
Tasking Motive: Maintain Integrity. Native infestation has developed appetite for Autonom conduits. Directive: Exterminate voracious computer bugs: Y/N?
任务目的：保持完整性。本地感染渗透进了自主机械导管。指令：消灭贪婪的计算机虫子：是/否？
This line was translated in Batch 12 and then merged into this xml file, on May 27th 2019. There is no need to relocalize this file as part of the second relocalization pass in DE, ES, FR, PL or RU.
Rogue bugs: deleted. Database updated: {STR_LeaderName} is competent. Rewards: allocated.
异常虫子：已被清除。数据库已更新：{STR_LeaderName}合格。奖励：已分配。
This line was translated in Batch 12 and then merged into this xml file, on May 27th 2019. There is no need to relocalize this file as part of the second relocalization pass in DE, ES, FR, PL or RU.

This line was translated in Batch 12 and then merged into this xml file, on May 27th 2019. There is no need to relocalize this file as part of the second relocalization pass in DE, ES, FR, PL or RU.

Threat Analysis: Autonom immune to Xenoplague. Xenoplague spreading contagion to humanoid populations. Service organics degrading. Medical Units repurposed to serve higher priorities. Enlist Autonom. Y/N?
威胁分析：免疫异星疫病的自主机械。异星疫病向类人生物传播疾病。服务有机物退化。医疗单位已重新部署为更高优先级服务。招募自主机械。是/否？
This line was translated in Batch 12 and then merged into this xml file, on May 27th 2019. There is no need to relocalize this file as part of the second relocalization pass in DE, ES, FR, PL or RU.
Database updated: pests have been fumigated. Reward has been prepared for entity: {STR_LeaderName}. Carbon relations: increased.
数据库已更新：害虫已被熏死。已为实体{STR_LeaderName}准备了奖励。生物关系：提升。
{STR_LeaderName} refers to the player character, can be male or female.
This line was translated in Batch 12 and then merged into this xml file, on May 27th 2019. There is no need to relocalize this file as part of the second relocalization pass in DE, ES, FR, PL or RU.
This line was translated in Batch 12 and then merged into this xml file, on May 27th 2019. There is no need to relocalize this file as part of the second relocalization pass in DE, ES, FR, PL or RU.

Submersible enemy raids Autonom coastal commerce. Threat: Submarine base. Action: Destroy submersible base. Problem: Autonom not designed for underwater environments. Solution: Dispatching {STR_LeaderName} to remove threat. Compliance: Y/N?
潜入水中的敌人袭击了自主机械沿海贸易。威胁：水下基地。行动：摧毁水下基地。问题：自主机械未设计进入水下环境。解决方案：派遣{STR_LeaderName}消除威胁。服从：是/否？
This line was translated in Batch 12 and then merged into this xml file, on May 27th 2019. There is no need to relocalize this file as part of the second relocalization pass in DE, ES, FR, PL or RU.
Submarine base eliminated. Reward prepared for entity: {STR_LeaderName}. Relations: increased.
水下基地已摧毁。奖励已为实体{STR_LeaderName}准备就绪。关系：提升。
This line was translated in Batch 12 and then merged into this xml file, on May 27th 2019. There is no need to relocalize this file as part of the second relocalization pass in DE, ES, FR, PL or RU.

In the text below, text refers to a person that can either be male or female. If relevant for translation, please use the ‘localized string’ column for the male text and the ‘alternative localized string’ column for the female text.

In the text below, any inserted strings - anything of the form {text} - is replaced by an integer value for the thing described in the brackets. If the {text} is not followed by a unit - e.g. shields, hitpoints - the icon for the unit is inserted together with the integer. The same holds for symbols - e.g. '+', '%' - which are occasionally inserted together with the integer.
For references to game terminology and in-world references, please check the glossary delivered as part of the documentation.
